ygData.subject: Re: Specialization skill -- NEWS
ygData.msgSnippet: I am on the EQ_Necromancer list and NO IT IS NOT! It works with weapons also. It is quite nice. A level 12ish. I believe reported getting a couple 20 life
ygData.messageBody:
I am on the EQ_Necromancer list and NO IT IS NOT! It works with weapons
also. It is quite nice. A level 12ish. I believe reported getting a couple
20 life drains during one combat session. So it is nice to have around. :)
----- Original Message -----
From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
To: <_EQ_Magic@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 4:55 PM
Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Specialization skill -- NEWS


> From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>
> >From: Wizard <wizard@...>
> >Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Specialization skill -- NEWS
> >Date: Wed, 05 May 1999 22:04:51 +0200
>
> >Vampiric Embrace (Necromancer and Shadow Knight) Once cast, this >spell
> >gives you a chance of draining HP from your target every time >you
attack.
> >Formally, this spell added to your attack roll.
>
> any fellow necros out there know if this is still a hand-to-hand spell?
>
